thread.title: 21 Things That Are Too Real For People Who Suck At Makeup
thread.title_full: 21 Things That Are Too Real For People Who Suck At Makeup

author: Daniela Cadena
title: 21 Things That Are Too Real For People Who Suck At Makeup
text:
View this image ›
instagram.com ID: 10530336 2. And just like art, it doesn’t always come naturally to everyone. View this image ›
Twitter: @velvetgh0st ID: 10530978 3. Face it, makeup is your Achilles’ heel. View this image ›
Twitter: @LilTreProd ID: 10529952 4. Maybe because you always forget to follow all the steps and rules. View this image ›
@samanthajademinor / instagram.com ID: 10530094 5. You know damn well that makeup tutorials only *look* easy. View this image ›
blog.beautybox5.com ID: 10531445 6. And every time you get the courage to try a new one, you always end up looking like a hot mess. View this image ›
cordeletta.tumblr.com ID: 10531271 7. Even when you *think* you followed the instructions to a T. View this image ›
decadenthumor.tumblr.com ID: 10531276 8. So you always just end up making up your own technique. View this image ›
ID: 10531732 9. You’ve tried convincing yourself that crappy makeup can be ~your thing~. View this image ›
Twitter: @kellerstellar ID: 10530972 10. Because you know that pretty much anyone can handle liquid liner better than you ever could. View this image ›
onsizzle.com ID: 10531767 11. You know liquid liner is the enemy. View this image ›
@bbbeccalee / instagram.com ID: 10530035 12. And Q-tips are your allies. View this image ›
Twitter: @CleoLashes ID: 10531076 13. Finally nailing your liner is euphoric. View this image ›
instagram.com ID: 10530302 14. Sometimes you think you look cute…until you step out into the sunlight. View this image ›
ID: 10531572 15. And you’re excited about trying a ~high vamp~ look, but it doesn’t exactly work out. View this image ›
senpaiviktor.tumblr.com / senpaiviktor.tumblr.com ID: 10529897 16. And those tricks to make your lips look fuller? They’re harder than they look. View this image ›
baddies.tumblr.com ID: 10529980 17. You deeply admire people who can multitask while doing their makeup. View this image ›
Twitter: @AnnaRussett ID: 10530992 18. And you’ve accepted the fact that you’re basically the left eyebrow of applying makeup. View this image ›
gettingfitstayinglit.tumblr.com ID: 10532058 19. But you always learn from your mistakes. View this image ›
instagram.com ID: 10530379 20. And when your makeup actually comes out right, you protect it at all costs. View this image ›
funnycaptions.com ID: 10530440 21. Because for you, a good makeup day is as special as February 29th. View this image ›
Twitter: @belle ID: 10531111 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
